title: Noren beats Saddier in play-off to win PGA Championship
description: Sweden's Alex Noren finally beat France's Adrien Saddier in a play-off to win the BMW PGA Championship in torrential rain at Wentworth Club.
content:
Only Rory McIlroy - with 20 titles - has won more times on the DP World Tour since 2009 than Noren and he needed all his nous to hold off the gutsy Saddier.
